siteMetadata.name: Anuradha Sahithi Padavala
siteMetadata.title: Anuradha Sahithi Padavala
siteMetadata.description: An aspiring Data Scientist adept in Statistical analysis and Machine learning.
siteMetadata.about: With proficiency in Python, R and Tableau, I am specialized in extracting insights from large datasets, leveraging data for strategic decision-making, and skilled in data visualization. Excellent at communicating complex data insights and collaborating in team environments.

experience.name: Tata Consultancy Services(TCS), India
experience.description: Developed predictive algorithms using key market data to anticipate forthcoming industrial service demands, facilitating efficient allocation of resources. Built a TABLEAU dashboard using information from various data services, providing the management with actionable insights that allowed them to prioritize devoted consumers, which led to a 10% increase in revenue. Determined customer segments and performed in-depth analysis of purchasing behaviors to steer data-driven business strategies. Generated weekly and monthly ad-hoc reports working with the analytic team and explained the findings to the client and to non-technical stakeholders. Collaborated with multiple cross-functional teams and dealt with complex data to retrieve proper insights and make it accessible to all diverse teams in the organization. Also contributed in data quality management and its optimization and complied with data governance and security. Integrated customer data from various sources for data analysis, which led to improvement of accuracy by 15%. Collected data and identified trends and patterns to solve various problems.

experience.name: RINL, India
experience.description: I worked as an onsite critical resource for NPCI during my time with Winjit Technologies while handling some of the internal Winjit tasks.

skills.name: Frameworks
skills.description: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib

skills.name: Other Technologies
skills.description: Snowflake, MongoDB, Data Cleansing, Data Validation Techniques, Predictive Modelling, Time Series Modelling (ARIMA, SARIMA), Data management

skills.name: Soft Skills
skills.description: Communication, Teamwork, Attention to detail, Adaptability to learn, Critical thinking
